name.japanese: ヴィンスモーク・サンジ

keyMoments.title: Sanji's Childhood Dream Revealed
keyMoments.description: Sanji reveals that as a child, he read the Devil Fruit Encyclopedia and desired only one fruit - the Suke Suke no Mi (Clear-Clear Fruit), which would allow him to become invisible.
keyMoments.significance: First time Sanji reveals he studied Devil Fruits as a child and actually wanted to eat one despite the curse. Shows his perverted nature is a long-standing character trait.
keyMoments.quote: I read about it in the Devil Fruit Encyclopedia... If I ever found that fruit, I would accept its curse and eat it myself.

keyMoments.title: Sanji's Enraged Assault on Absalom
keyMoments.description: Fueled by rage over his stolen dream and Absalom's treatment of Nami, Sanji unleashes a devastating barrage of kicks on Absalom, overwhelming the Clear-Clear Fruit user.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's fighting prowess when motivated by strong emotions and his protective nature toward women.
keyMoments.quote: You ate the fruit and robbed me of my dream of seeing naked women!

reveals.information: Read the Devil Fruit Encyclopedia as a child and desired the Suke Suke no Mi (Clear-Clear Fruit) for its invisibility powers
Possesses knowledge of Devil Fruit mechanics and specific fruits from childhood study

keyMoments.title: Absalom Beaten by Sanji
keyMoments.description: Absalom is overwhelmed by Sanji's furious assault after Sanji reveals that Absalom 'stole his dream' by eating the Clear-Clear Fruit first.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Absalom's Devil Fruit power isn't enough to overcome Sanji's rage-fueled attacks.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Stamp Against Moria
keyMoments.description: Luffy discovers a way to bypass Doppelman by jumping off the ledge and using his rubber body to swing back with Gomu Gomu no Stamp, successfully kicking Gecko Moria through the floor.
keyMoments.significance: First solid hit Luffy lands on the Warlord, demonstrating tactical creativity in combat.
keyMoments.quote: You said I can't touch you, right? Then take this! Gomu Gomu no... Stamp!

abilities.description: Luffy uses his rubber body to swing from a ledge and deliver a powerful kick, used effectively against Gecko Moria.

keyMoments.title: Moria's Doppelman vs Luffy
keyMoments.description: Gecko Moria uses his shadow duplicate Doppelman, which transforms into Brick Bats to swarm and peck at Luffy, demonstrating the versatility of his Kage Kage no Mi powers.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Moria's tactical use of his Devil Fruit abilities to avoid direct confrontation.

keyMoments.title: First Solid Hit from Luffy
keyMoments.description: Moria takes his first solid hit from Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Stamp attack, showing he is vulnerable when attacked directly despite Doppelman's protection.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that Moria's defense isn't impenetrable and sets up future battle strategies.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Defeats Kumashi
keyMoments.description: Usopp uses his Flame Star attack and oil trail technique to defeat the zombie bear Kumashi, demonstrating his resourcefulness in combat.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's effectiveness against zombie enemies using fire-based attacks.

keyMoments.title: Encounters the Ghost Princess
keyMoments.description: Usopp catches up to Perona, who reveals herself as the Ghost Princess in her astral projection form, setting up their upcoming confrontation.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up one of the most memorable battles in Thriller Bark due to the unique interaction between Usopp's negative personality and Perona's negative ghosts.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Herself as the Ghost Princess
keyMoments.description: Perona dramatically introduces herself to Usopp as the Ghost Princess while floating in her astral projection form, threatening to eliminate all the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Perona's theatrical personality and sets up her battle with Usopp.
keyMoments.quote: I am the Ghost Princess! Once you're out of the picture, the rest of your crew will be next!

keyMoments.title: Perona's Astral Projection Ability
keyMoments.description: Perona demonstrates her ability to leave her physical body and project her consciousness as a ghost form using the Horo Horo no Mi, floating intangibly through the air.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a key aspect of Perona's Devil Fruit abilities that will be crucial in her upcoming battle.

abilities.description: Perona can leave her physical body and project her consciousness as an intangible ghost form that can float through the air.

reveals.information: Can use astral projection to leave her physical body using the Horo Horo no Mi

keyMoments.title: Unconscious During Sanji's Battle
keyMoments.description: Nami remains unconscious during Sanji's furious assault on Absalom, serving as a motivation for Sanji's protective rage.
keyMoments.significance: Emphasizes Sanji's protective nature toward Nami and women in general.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Usopp's Fire Attack
keyMoments.description: The zombie bear Kumashi is set on fire by Usopp's Flame Star attack and oil trail, eventually being crushed by debris.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the effectiveness of fire against zombie enemies.
